summary: Email correspondence between attorneys regarding scheduling a preparation session and accepting a subpoena. The email discusses rescheduling a meeting for a witness preparation session and mentions the acceptance of a subpoena and fees.

persons.name: Martin Druyan
persons.context: Attorney communicating about scheduling a preparation session and accepting a subpoena and fees on behalf of a client.

events.title: Subpoena Acceptance and Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Attorney Martin Druyan accepts a subpoena and fees and discusses rescheduling a preparation session from Thursday to Wednesday evening.

keyFacts: Attorney Martin Druyan is involved in accepting a subpoena and fees for a legal matter.
A preparation session for a witness or client is being scheduled, initially set for Thursday but requested to be moved to Wednesday evening.
The correspondence indicates legal proceedings or preparations are ongoing as of April 2021.
